des: "This is by far the best pico I have ever had. Fresh cilantro and sweetened lime juice are key to making this recipe really delicious. You can find the lime juice in the aisle with margarita mixers and such. This makes a lot to feed a crowd!"
ins: Place the tomatoes, onion, jalapeno peppers, cilantro, and lime juice into a large mixing bowl. Sprinkle with taco seasoning and stir gently until evenly mixed. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to blend before serving.
